EASTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
MAN OVERBOARD FROM M/V PHILADELPHIA IN VICINITY
37-31.5S 002-43.7E. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
